name: nativescript-textinputlayout
description: A NativeScript plugin to provide an XML widget to implement the Material Design TextInputLayout.

scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-textinputlayout; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin add ..; cd ..

author: Bradley Gore <bradley@bradleygore.com> (https://github.com/bradleygore)
